author: Staff Reporter
text:
The Department of Mathematics, Scott Christian College, is conducting Principal Arumairaj Memorial Quiz Competition in Mathematics for Plus Two Students on March 1.

A written test will be conducted to select teams for the competition. Each school could send a team of a maximum of three students for the competition.

Interested schools should register their teams by January 25 with Giftlin Vedha Merly through mobile phone on 9790291305 or e-mail: giftinmerly@gmail.com.
title: Maths quiz to be held
